nodes.text: The Neshei system was located in the Neshei sector, a part of the Outer Expansion Zone sub-region of the Expansion Region. A hyperlane connected the system to the Dorin and Vardoss systems. The Neshei system fell within the borders of the New Republic in 12 ABY.

The Neshei system was established in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas later placed the system in grid square J-8.
